metadata.name: Dog life
metadata.description: This preset forces you to play only in wolf form! Beware that it's a very technical preset. Safe locations, complexity 9.
metadata.author: Wecoc, Forat Negre & eldri7ch

goals: Holy glasses + Heart of Vlad + Tooth of Vlad + Rib of Vlad + Ring of Vlad + Eye of Vlad

placeRelic.comment: Force Power of Wolf at Cube of Zoe
Force something vanilla at the shop

itemLocations.comment: Power of Sire below Scylla to break the ice floor

lockLocation.comment: Requires nothing
You can Boost up the bottom ledge
locks: Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf
Leap Stone + Gravity Boots

lockLocation.comment: You can use Flight to wolf charge across
locks: Leap Stone + Gravity Boots + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf
Skill of Wolf + Flight of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Requires nothing
Requires Gravity Boots to get to the ledge
locks: Gravity Boots + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Leap Stone or Gravity Boots on the clock statue
locks: Leap Stone
Gravity Boots

lockLocation.comment: Boost is required to come back up
locks: Gold ring + Silver ring
escapeRequires: Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Smell is required, so items must be blocked
locks: Smell of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Requires nothing
Requires Power of Wolf to make the jump
locks: Power of Wolf
Gravity Boots

lockLocation.comment: Mist gate is removed
locks: Power of Wolf + Leap Stone
Gravity Boots

lockLocation.comment: Can only be accessed by chaining wolf charges mid-air the entire map
locks: Skill of Wolf + Flight of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: You need Leap Stone or Gravity Boots to make the jump
locks: Leap Stone
Gravity Boots

lockLocation.comment: Smell is required, so items must be blocked
locks: Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf + Smell of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Requires both Boost and Flight, logic relics are blocked except Vlads
locks: Power of Wolf + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf + Flight of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Smell is required, so items must be blocked
locks: Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf + Smell of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Mist gate is removed
locks: Spike Breaker + Jewel of Open

lockLocation.comment: Skill of Wolf to jump from the other side
locks: Jewel of Open + Skill of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Can be accessed with only Jewel of Open
locks: Jewel of Open

lockLocation.comment: Requires items or fire to break the floor
locks: Jewel of Open + Merman Statue + Gear Strap
Jewel of Open + Merman Statue + Power of Wolf + Fire of Wolf
Jewel of Open + Merman Statue + Skill of Wolf + Fire of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Can be accessed with only Jewel of Open
locks: Jewel of Open

lockLocation.comment: The shaft to Olrox requires Boost and a big jump
locks: Leap Stone + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf
Gravity Boots + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: The shaft to Olrox requires Boost and a big jump
locks: Leap Stone + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf
Gravity Boots + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: The jump to the bridge switch requires Power of Wolf
locks: Jewel of Open + Power of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: You enter with Spike Breaker, needs a big jump to exit
locks: Jewel of Open + Power of Wolf + Spike Breaker + Leap Stone
Jewel of Open + Power of Wolf + Spike Breaker + Gravity Boots
Jewel of Open + Power of Wolf + Spike Breaker + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf
escapeRequires: Leap Stone + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: The catacombs require at least Leap Stone to exit
locks: Jewel of Open + Power of Wolf

lockLocation.comment: Darkwing Bat: Left side requires Boost + at least Leap Stone, bait is blocked
locks: Holy glasses + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf + Leap Stone
Holy glasses + Skill of Wolf + Boost of Wolf + Gravity Boots

writes.comment: Remove Soul of Wolf relic requirement
Damage special case: Spikes at Royal Chapel
Damage special case: Spikes at Reverse Chapel
Transform to Alucard on Save start
Transform to Wolf on Save end
Allow Wolf form to open doors [Adapted from Bat-Master]
Doors accept Wolf form [Adapted from Bat-Master]
Flight of Wolf effect (Wolf charge mid-air)
Boost of Wolf wall charge start
Boost of Wolf wall charge update
Clock room gold and silver ring bugfix
Remove Mist gate at Soul of Bat
Remove Mist gate at Silver ring
Allow Wolf to press the switch to Mines
Wolf can see in the dark
Top of Olrox shaft map tiles
Reverse Castle Keep Boost map tiles
Reverse Castle Keep Door map tiles
Reverse Marble Gallery to Caverns Door map tiles
Reverse Mines to Caverns Door map tiles

Reverse Chapel Boost map tiles B
Reverse Chapel Boost map tiles C
Reverse Chapel Boost map tiles D
